MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10pm to allow our engineers to safely remove the generator from the network and reconnect supplies back to the main network following repairs on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9:33 PM on Friday, 02 April 2021.
